mapper.select: SELECT qh.id AS qualityHistoryId, qi.id AS qualityInspectionId, qi.name AS qualityInspectionName, wo.id AS workOrderId, i.id AS itemId, i.name AS itemName, l.id AS lotId, TO_CHAR(qh.inspection_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS inspectionDate, CAST(qh.result_value AS CHAR) AS resultValue, qis.unit AS resultValueUnit, qh.result_code AS resultCode, dsc_result.name AS resultCodeName, qh.status_code AS statusCode, dsc_status.name AS statusCodeName FROM quality_inspection_history qh LEFT JOIN quality_inspection qi ON qh.quality_inspection_id = qi.id LEFT JOIN work_order wo ON qh.work_order_id = wo.id LEFT JOIN item i ON qh.item_id = i.id LEFT JOIN lot l ON qh.lot_id = l.id LEFT JOIN quality_inspection_standard qis ON qh.quality_inspection_id = qis.quality_inspection_id AND qh.item_id = qis.item_id LEFT JOIN detail_sys_code dsc_result ON qh.result_code = dsc_result.detail_code LEFT JOIN detail_sys_code dsc_status ON qh.status_code = dsc_status.detail_code WHERE wo.id = #{workOrderId} ORDER BY qh.id DESC
